name: coderabbitai-mcp
description: MCP server for interacting with CodeRabbit AI reviews on GitHub pull requests

tools.name: get_coderabbit_reviews
tools.description: Get all CodeRabbit reviews for a specific GitHub pull request

tools.name: get_review_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific CodeRabbit review

tools.name: get_review_comments
tools.description: Get all individual line comments from a CodeRabbit review

tools.name: get_comment_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific CodeRabbit comment including AI prompts

tools.name: resolve_comment
tools.description: Mark a CodeRabbit comment as resolved or addressed
